text: The Dow Jones Industrial Average has experienced a significant surge
following the news that the United States has captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro
As of today, January 6, 2026, the stock market is reacting positively to this development
with the Dow jumping in response to the capture
This event marks a major turning point in the complex and often tumultuous relationship between the US and Venezuela
The capture of Maduro has the potential to impact global markets and economies
and investors are closely watching the situation as it unfolds
